title: We MUST Remain Peaceful | Guests: Edwin Black & Rachel Bovard | 1/12/21
description:
Glenn urges viewers not to participate in armed protests as President Trump declares an emergency for D.C. One allegedly pro-Trump poster circulating the internet looks suspiciously communist. An internet company in Idaho will block Facebook and Twitter for customers who request it. Facebook is also removing any “Stop the Steal” content. Cryptocurrency and Wall Street expert Teeka Tiwari joins to discuss Bitcoin and its current fluctuation. “IBM and the Holocaust” author Edwin Black breaks down Big Tech’s current censorship practices and how to fight against them. The Conservative Partnership Institute’s Rachel Bovard reviews the current political climate, Section 230, and the moves Republicans should make next.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
